emperor-palpatine-commander.author: Fantasy Flight Games
emperor-palpatine-commander.name: Emperor Palpatine
emperor-palpatine-commander.ability: After deploying fleets, place 1 defense token of each type on this card. At the start of each Ship Phase you may discard 1 of those tokens. If you do, until the end of the round, if an enemy ship or squadron spends a matching token during its Spend Defense Tokens step, discard that token.
